column1: Decolonial Thought and Social Theory - MSc
column5: The MSc in Decolonial Thought and Social Theory offers an exciting interdisciplinary focus for the study of decoloniality, as well as the various social and political problems it touches upon.By studying this course you’ll be able to critically understand issues and debates around the world concerning the contested legacies and continuities of colonialism. You’ll be equipped to do this from epistemological, socio-economic and geopolitical
